医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
缺锌会增加肺部感染的风险饮食中缺锌会促进鲍曼不动杆菌引起的肺部感染；根据 11 月 15 日发表在《自然微生物学》杂志上的一项新研究，这是呼吸机相关性肺炎的主要原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Zinc-deficiency-linked-to-increased-risk-of-lung-infection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Zinc-deficiency-linked-to-increased-risk-of-lung-infection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=632deafe-ba1a-41f6-80ab-a60b45f36748 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 23:36:45 -0500 Zinc deficiency linked to increased risk of lung infection
光脉冲有望控制癫痫发作加州大学旧金山分校、加州大学圣克鲁斯分校和加州大学伯克利分校的研究人员利用光脉冲来预防神经元中的癫痫样活动，这有一天可能成为一种治疗癫痫的新方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Pulses-of-light-show-promise-in-controlling-seizures.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Pulses-of-light-show-promise-in-controlling-seizures.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a7e3f081-c8d0-42a6-a0d0-8dd0ed201989 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 23:02:52 -0500 Pulses of light show promise in controlling seizures
怀孕期间的抗癫痫药物与儿童神经发育风险有关德雷克塞尔多恩西夫公共卫生学院研究人员的最新数据显示，在怀孕期间服用抗癫痫药物来控制癫痫发作和精神疾病的母亲所生的孩子可能会面临更大的神经发育疾病风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Antiseizure-medications-during-pregnancy-linked-to-neurodevelopmental-risks-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Antiseizure-medications-during-pregnancy-linked-to-neurodevelopmental-risks-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ac8597bd-9168-43e5-b5d0-a76d2c68c3dc Fri, 15 Nov 2024 22:20:14 -0500 Antiseizure medications during pregnancy linked to neurodevelopmental risks in children
研究人员发现突变如何破坏蛋白质剪接并导致疾病一个国际研究小组发现了一种对细胞蛋白质生产至关重要的新机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Researchers-discover-how-mutations-disrupt- Protein-splicing-and-cause-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Researchers-discover-how-mutations-disrupt- Protein-splicing-and-cause-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6612cf0a-7c94-4e08-88fc-55edd5013193 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 22:00:00 -0500 Researchers discover how mutations disrupt protein splicing and cause disease
特定的氧化还原蛋白被确定为铁死亡的关键调节因子亥姆霍兹慕尼黑的研究人员与东北大学的同事合作，发现一种特定的氧化还原蛋白是铁死亡的关键调节剂，铁死亡是一种受调节的氧化细胞死亡的形式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Specific-redox- Protein-identified-as-a-ritic-regulator-of-ferroptosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Specific-redox- Protein-identified-as-a-ritic-regulator-of-ferroptosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=55f6fa50-b5b7-443c-9a79-43ac7b32c00e Fri, 15 Nov 2024 21:46:00 -0500 Specific redox protein identified as a critical regulator of ferroptosis
研究揭示乳腺癌检测光声成像中的肤色偏差乳腺癌是全世界的主要健康问题，早期发现对于有效治疗至关重要。传统的成像方法（例如乳房X光检查）具有局限性，特别是对于乳腺组织致密的女性而言。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Study-reveals-skin-tone-bias-in-photoacoustic-imaging-for-breast-cancer-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Study-reveals-skin-tone-bias-in-photoacoustic-imaging-for-breast-cancer-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3d041bd3-085a-4457-a945-af1009b91cf3 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 16:14:00 -0500 Study reveals skin tone bias in photoacoustic imaging for breast cancer detection
国际团队发布人工智能在神经肿瘤学中使用的建议由领先的神经肿瘤学研究人员和临床医生组成的国际多学科团队发布了良好临床实践的新建议：一套有助于确保临床试验结果可靠并保护患者的指南 -；关于使用人工智能方法更准确地诊断、监测和治疗脑癌患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/International-team-releases-recommendations-for-AI-use-in-neuro-oncology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/International-team-releases-recommendations-for-AI-use-in-neuro-oncology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c61edd56-5184-4a13-a568-9d48332fd536 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 16:06:00 -0500 International team releases recommendations for AI use in neuro-oncology
EASI 算法将改变法医药物识别流程得益于西弗吉尼亚大学和美国缉毒局之间的研究合作，犯罪现场调查人员和毒理学家们终于可以松口气了，他们一直在努力准确、迅速地识别执法部门查获的毒品，并可在审判中作为证据。 。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/EASI-algorithm-set-to-transform-forensic-drug-identification-processes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/EASI-algorithm-set-to-transform-forensic-drug-identification-processes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c544fb77-5852-494b-88d1-1dd80b61b4aa Fri, 15 Nov 2024 15:58:00 -0500 EASI algorithm set to transform forensic drug identification processes
计算机辅助 CBT 和心理健康应用程序可有效减少焦虑、抑郁症状根据《精神病学实践杂志》（Wolters Kluwer Lippincott 产品组合的一部分）上发表的一篇评论，计算机辅助认知行为治疗 (CCBT) 和移动心理健康应用程序需要持续开发和持续努力，以提高患者和临床医生的接受度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Computer-assistance-CBT-and-mental-health-apps- effective-in-reducing-anxiety-depression-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Computer-assistance-CBT-and-mental-health-apps- effective-in-reducing-anxiety-depression-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8d041c99-d725-4660-be0e-f3d96aaecf55 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 15:51:00 -0500 Computer-assisted CBT and mental health apps effective in reducing anxiety, depression symptoms
Evo 模型将改变合成生物学和疾病诊断一项新研究提出了“Evo”——一种机器学习模型，能够以无与伦比的准确性解码和设计从分子到基因组规模的 DNA、RNA 和蛋白质序列。 Evo 预测、生成和设计整个基因组序列的能力可能会改变合成生物学的完成方式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Evo-model-set-to-transform-synthetic-biology-and-disease-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241115/Evo-model-set-to-transform-synthetic-biology-and-disease-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=29625ad2-94d6-4b9b-8bb1-66e5d20119c4 Fri, 15 Nov 2024 15:45:00 -0500 Evo model set to transform synthetic biology and disease diagnosis
